alert.note: Alert for Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:56AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Norton County through 530 AM CDT... At 456 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Lenora, or 14 miles south of Norton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Edmond around 505 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
